title: Internet broke and now I have to wait 20 minutes.
body:
My internet gave up on me while playing a match (which has happened some times due to our router being quite old)
Now I got hit with a 20 Min. waiting time. Is it possible to get it removed?
It's alright if it can't be, since anyone can say that their internet broke when they rage quitted.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=aesthethicccc,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rtMVXKnZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-27T12:50:56.207+0000)
>
> My internet gave up on me while playing a match (which has happened some times due to our router being quite old)
> Now I got hit with a 20 Min. waiting time. Is it possible to get it removed?
> It&#039;s alright if it can&#039;t be, since anyone can say that their internet broke when they rage quitted.

No, because you're supposed to use that 20 minutes to shop online for a new router.

I wish I could :D
My parents don't want to buy a new one and I am going to move out soon, so it's their problem now haha.
If they won't remove it for bugsplat they won't remove it for internet problems.
Ok, thanks. Guess I'll just have to deal with it :P

your best chance is to just que for Co-op.
sadly Riot won't remove your leavebuster.
If you don't have good internet, stop playing League until you do.
